channel.title: jenkins on jmmv.dev
channel.description: Recent content in jenkins on jmmv.dev

item.title: Refocusing Kyua maybe?
item.description: The FreeBSD devsummit that just passed by gave me enough insight into Jenkins to question the long-term plans for Kyua. Uh, WHAT?! Let me explain. In the beginning... One of the original but unstated goals of Kyua was to fix the "mess" that is the NetBSD releng test run logs site: if you pay close attention, you will notice that various individuals have reinvented the wheel over and over again in an attempt to automate release builds and test suite runs.
